documentation.name: Caret Predictions and Probabilities
documentation.summary: Generates two data tables one for predictions and one for probabilities of the supplied samples being of a class.

output.name: Caret Predictions
output.description: Data table of predictions, this can be output as a table.

output.name: Caret Probabilities
output.description: Data table of probabilities, this can be output as a table.
